data.event: Busan (부산 or 釜山(Korean pronunciation: [pusʰan]), officially Busan Metropolitan City), romanized as Pusan before 2000, is South Korea's second largest city after Seoul, with a population of approximately 3.6 million.

event.title: November 14, 2005, the city authorities officially announced

data.event: On November 14, 2005, the city authorities officially announced its bid to host the 2020 Summer Olympics Games.
After Pyeongchang's successful bid for the 2018 Winter Olympics, Busan is considering bidding to host the 2028 or 2032 Summer Olympics.
